description: Main entry point for a Flutter application setting up the app theme, main page, and a simple loading UI.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up MaterialApp with custom theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the loading UI of the home page.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp widget, returns MaterialApp configured with theme and home page.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _MyHomePageState widget, constructs the Scaffold with AppBar and loading content.
